projects.name: Business site
projects.description: My first-ever website, built during my Technigo bootcamp using HTML5, CSS3, and basic JavaScript. Created independently over three weeks with a focus on responsive design and clean code.

projects.name: Hack Week: Weather App
projects.description: Our first collaborative team project, created during Hack Week, using a weather API along with TypeScript and Geolocation. I was primarily responsible for implementing the CSS and reviewing/testing the TypeScript to ensure a smooth and responsive user experience

projects.name: Recipe Library API
projects.description: A responsive web application I designed and developed, allowing users to explore recipes based on cuisine, diet, or keyword, powered by the Spoonacular API. Using a Figma prototype as the foundation, I made personalized UI enhancements to optimize the mobile experience. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, the app features filtering, sorting, and a random recipe generator, offering an engaging and seamless user experience across devices.

projects.name: Acecessibility App
projects.description: Built with semantic HTML, responsive CSS, and JavaScript, Typescript, the app includes full keyboard navigation, making it inclusive for users with diverse needs. I collaborated closely with my teammates on planning and implementation, with a strong focus on clean, accessible code and intuitive UI/UX design.
